name: What do you hear?? Yanny vs Laurel
description: What word or name do you hear, and how far do you have to move the slider to hear another? Check it out and be surprised by the possibilities of your brain!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: Athlon 2 X3 450 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce EN9600 GT Storage: 50 MB available space
